name: Entrepreneurial tycoon
description:
Get rid of the three-dimensional scene of traditional chessboard


Although 《Entrepreneurial tycoon》 is a kind of millionaire game, its place is not the traditional millionaire chessboard. The map of the game will evolve from an ordinary plane layout to a three-dimensional city, and the road will replace the route grid, giving players a unique experience.

Items With Various Functions


In 《Entrepreneurial tycoon》, ordinary cards are no longer used as the carrier of props. Instead, 3D models of the props will be used in props stores and scenes. Players can use them to seek more benefits for themselves, hinder their opponents, and trap them step by step.

A Variety Of random Events


There are dozens of different random events in the game, and the triggering probability is different according to the lucky value. Events are classified according to different types, which will distinguish lucky events, neutral events and unfortunate events. Different events have different effects. Whether lucky or unfortunate events are used properly, they will affect the direction of the game.

Weather and Day Night Changes


Unlike traditional tycoon like games, Entrepreneur has a weather system installed in it. Different weather will have different effects on the overall playing method. Players can change the current weather through match settings in the room, or random events and props in the match, so as to obtain a completely different experience. The time system is also installed in the game. The city scenery will be different between sunrise and sunset. With the lights of the city gradually lighting up, the beautiful night scene will be displayed in front of us.

Multiple Vehicles


In 《Entrepreneurial tycoon》, there are seven different types of vehicles, each of which has four attributes: durability, storage space, maximum distance and speed. Of course, not the most expensive vehicle is the best. Even inexpensive vehicles have different specialization directions. Choose the most suitable vehicle and formulate different policies and strategies.

Loans and Auctions


In this game, players will be able to use the property they purchased for mortgage loans to obtain more activity funds. However, if the loan is not paid off within the specified time, the mortgaged property will be auctioned and become the assets of others.

Financial Investment and stock Market


In 《Entrepreneurial tycoon》, players can obtain huge income by purchasing financial products, or make long-term plans by purchasing stocks. However, regardless of the way, players need to bear certain risks, but this may also become a decisive means of turnover at the end of the game.

Investable Buildings With Unique Functions


The investable buildings in the game are divided into three categories, including shops focusing on economic income, hotels with detention function and economic income, and research institutes that can obtain free props. Different buildings represent different winning methods, and reasonable arrangement of the land purchased will be the key to the final victory.
developers: 泉州市兰梦网络科技中心（有限合伙）
publishers: 泉州市兰梦网络科技中心（有限合伙）
